about_the_game: Discover the captivating world of 'Pranoid' through its exceptional soundtrack, featuring eight unique tracks and their inventive remixes. The list includes 'Bluszcz - False Faith Master 16 10,' a haunting and profound piece, and various versions of 'SMUGY - Wish,' including the extended 'Long Version,' an intense 'MIX,' a creatively reimagined 'Remix,' and a nostalgically charged 'Retro Version.' Completing the collection is 'YNAF Synthwave,' a track that epitomizes the essence of 80s synthwave music, transporting listeners to a realm of retro-futuristic vibes and atmospheric melodies. This diverse collection is a tribute to the iconic sounds of the 1980s, reinterpreted for the modern era.

name: Paranoid Soundtrack
short_description: Gain access to 8 tracks and their remixes from the game Pranoid. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric sounds of 80s music
